name: League Of Battle
description: You start by creating a server or joining a existing. When you enter the game, you chose character and team. Click login and enter. Go to the portal. It is not possible to go back from the new world, before the fight has been finished. Follow the minions to the tower and kill every tower before entering the final fight.  The shield will be removed when all towers are defeated. Towers cannot attack. If minions kill you, you will respawn at the portal. No mini map is available. Kill the other players on the opposing team to win. Space will keep you connected with your player or move the cursor / mouse in the direction you want zoom.
